20110105171603.000|20110105171606.000|CC1|HEALTH, HOW TO STOP A COLD IN   
20110105171606.000|20110105171609.000|CC1|ITS TRACKS.

20110105171614.000|20110105171616.000|CC1|FROM COMING ON.

20110105171619.000|20110105171623.000|CC1|RASHINI RAJ.

20110105171628.000|20110105171629.000|CC1|PLAN THAT SAYS IMMEDIATELY AFTER

20110105171641.000|20110105171644.000|CC1|>>> WHAT'S HAPPENING WHEN YOU   
20110105171644.000|20110105171646.000|CC1|HAVE A COLD, ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU
20110105171646.000|20110105171649.000|CC1|HAVE A FEVER, BUT WITH A LOT OF 
20110105171649.000|20110105171651.000|CC1|MUCUS PRODUCTION YOU'RE LOSING A
20110105171651.000|20110105171652.000|CC1|LOT OF FLUID.                   
20110105171652.000|20110105171653.000|CC1|YOU WANT TO DRINK SEVERAL

20110105171656.000|20110105171659.000|CC1|YOU SHOULD AVOID ALCOHOL AND    
20110105171659.000|20110105171659.000|CC1|CAFFEINE.

20110105171702.000|20110105171704.000|CC1|>> VITAMIN C IS A LITTLE BIT    
20110105171704.000|20110105171705.000|CC1|CONTROVERSIAL.                  
20110105171705.000|20110105171705.000|CC1|IT DEFINITELY HAVE NOT BEEN     
20110105171705.000|20110105171707.000|CC1|SHOWN TO PREVENT A COLD, IT MAY 
20110105171707.000|20110105171708.000|CC1|SHORTEN THE DURATION.           
20110105171708.000|20110105171716.000|CC1|>> IT CAN MAKE YOU FEEL BETTER. 
20110105171716.000|20110105171720.000|CC1|TWO, YOU SAY GARGLE WITH SALT   
20110105171720.000|20110105171721.000|CC1|WATER.                          
20110105171721.000|20110105171724.000|CC1|>> THE SALT CAN DRAW OUT SOME OF
20110105171724.000|20110105171726.000|CC1|THE MUCOUS THAT'S IN THE BACK OF
20110105171726.000|20110105171728.000|CC1|YOUR THROAT, AND IT CAN SOOTHE  
20110105171728.000|20110105171729.000|CC1|THE PAIN AS WELL.               
20110105171729.000|20110105171730.000|CC1|>> WHAT ABOUT CLEARING OUT YOUR 
20110105171730.000|20110105171733.000|CC1|NASAL PASSAGES.                 
20110105171733.000|20110105171734.000|CC1|YOU ACTUALLY HAVE A PLAN FOR    
20110105171734.000|20110105171736.000|CC1|THAT AND THAT INVOLVES GOING TO 
20110105171736.000|20110105171737.000|CC1|THE DRUGSTORE?                  
20110105171737.000|20110105171739.000|CC1|>> GETTING THE SALINE NASAL     
20110105171739.000|20110105171740.000|CC1|DROPS OR THE NASAL SPRAY THAT   
20110105171740.000|20110105171742.000|CC1|CAN REALLY FLUSH OUT THE VIRUS  
20110105171742.000|20110105171745.000|CC1|THAT'S IN THERE ALREADY, BUT    
20110105171745.000|20110105171747.000|CC1|ALSO THE MUCOUS, IT CAN HELP    
20110105171747.000|20110105171749.000|CC1|CLEAR YOUR NASAL PASSAGES SO YOU
20110105171749.000|20110105171750.000|CC1|CAN BREATHE A LITTLE BIT BETTER.
20110105171750.000|20110105171753.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE NOT STOPPING THE COLD,
20110105171753.000|20110105171754.000|CC1|BUT YOU'RE JUST ABLE TO GET     
20110105171754.000|20110105171757.000|CC1|THROUGH IT EASIER IF YOU CAN    
20110105171757.000|20110105171758.000|CC1|BREATHING YOU YOUR NOSE?        
20110105171758.000|20110105171758.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110105171758.000|20110105171800.000|CC1|>> LET'S TALK ABOUT OVER THE    
20110105171800.000|20110105171803.000|CC1|COUNTER MEDICINES FOR A MINUTE, 
20110105171803.000|20110105171804.000|CC1|THEY DON'T ACTUALLY STOP A COLD,
20110105171804.000|20110105171806.000|CC1|THEY REALLY JUST MAKE THINGS

20110105171808.000|20110105171810.000|CC1|A LOT OF US HAVE BEEN TAUGHT    
20110105171810.000|20110105171811.000|CC1|THAT WE MAYBE SHOULD NOT DO A

20110105171814.000|20110105171816.000|CC1|THAT WE CAN DEVELOP OUR IMMUNE

20110105172015.000|20110105172017.000|CC1|>>> COMING UP FROM GETTING RID
